commands.name: /run-test-pipeline
commands.description: Run full test pipeline (backend, frontend, E2E, AI Code Fixer, reporting).

commands.name: /run-test-pipeline-focus
commands.description: Run the test pipeline focused on a specific topic or area (e.g. 'api tests', 'auth', 'frontend components').

commands.name: /fix-tests
commands.description: Run AI Code Fixer against last known test results.
